articles.content:
But Multan was the hardest week any England player or fan has experienced. Previous generations had it tougher with fewer comforts but did not experience the same security levels. 
Illness was rampa… [+1999 chars]

articles.author: Tom Gillespie
articles.title: Argentina's World Cup celebrations descend into chaos in Buenos Aires as fans clash with police - Sky News
articles.content:
An open-air bus parade for Argentina's World Cup heroes had to be called off as the celebrations descended into chaos.
Argentina captain Lionel Messi and his fellow teammates instead boarded helicop… [+3803 chars]
